mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist_items ( user_id, product_id, added_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{productId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT w.user_id AS userId , w.product_id AS productId , p.name AS productName , p.base_price AS price , pi.image_url AS imageUrl , w.added_at AS createdAt FROM wishlist_items w JOIN products p ON p.id = w.product_id /* 대표(썸네일) 이미지를 한 장만 가져오도록 인라인 뷰 */ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id , MIN(image_url) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY CASE image_type WHEN 'THUMBNAIL' THEN 1 WHEN 'PRIMARY' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END , display_order) AS image_url FROM product_images WHERE is_active = 'Y' GROUP BY product_id ) pi ON pi.product_id = p.id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY w.added_at DESC
